website_summaries.verdict: Choose this iPhone 7 case if you like the idea of the multiple  good-looking design choices; but keep in mind it comes with some durability and functionality concerns.
pros: Stands out in terms of attractiveness, as it comes in numerous designs
Provides a slim fit that doesn't cause a lot of added bulk
Material has a bit of flexibility to it that makes the case easy to put on your phone
cons: Has the tendency to scratch fairly easily, and offers limited protection from drops
A few reports of the material blocking ports/camera functions

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for, get this case!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flattering phone case. I get compliments on it every time I pull my phone out. I have the rose gold iPhone and it compliments the case. The colors are practically the same. The case covers all corners of my phone. It leaves me with less stress worrying about dropping it and scratching the edges. I would suggest getting a shatter proof phone screen and a pop socket to offer more protection. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Case covers iPhone 7 camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my iPhone 7 and it covers half of the camera. You cannot effectively use the iPhone 7 camera with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: slippery cover
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a rubber bumper grip cover for non-slip use. There isn't a bumper grip at all. It is slippery and doesn't provide the ability to get a solid grip on your device. I've had the cover on for only two days and the end of it started peeling apart. For both reasons, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie R.

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking - do not buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it no stars. It is cheap and thin, but with Amazon's new return policy, it would cost me almost as much to return it as I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: LuvtoRead

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Protect Phone
customer_reviews.text: This cover doesn’t look like the photo at all. Color isn’t “rose” gold but more like light bronze and is not like iPhone pink. Its “matt” white is very dull and makes the item look cheap. But most importantly, “Edge raised 3mm” is totally false. It’s probably 0.3mm (if that) and it hardly protects the screen. I wanted to like it so much as it looked very pretty online but I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first week then... EWW.
customer_reviews.text: This case is super cute brand new! But after 1-2 weeks it started looking super dingy, dirty and grey. It's like it STAINS with any kind of dirt it gets on it. I am not a dirty person, and Ive had many a white case before, and they do get a little dirty but you usually just wipe it off like with anything else. But this one? NOPE. It just STAINS, it almost looks like its been dyed its so different compared to what it looked like before! And it just WONT come off, no matter the scrubbing or product.
customer_reviews.author: Genie1

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty case, smooth and fits like a glove! I’m not sure about durability but it’s very pretty and that’s all I care about . Lol
customer_reviews.author: Emily Printz

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek looking phone case that also protects phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Very clean looking! I honestly didn’t think it would protect my phone much & to be honest I’m still not completely sure if it’s just the way my phone happened to fall that it didn’t break or if this case truly protected it but either way it didn’t break after dropping several times! And it’s a great looking case so overall I’m pretty happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just put it on my phone and it’s very cute. I like that it’s slim but also goes over the corners and edges of my screen. I feel like it will protect my phone when the time comes. There haven’t been any issues of the phone case blocking my charger, or the volume or lock screen buttons being too hard to push, so the case definitely fits very well. I also love that the rose gold part in the marble design is shiny. I’d buy this type of case again once I get a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. It’s soft, not rubbery like other silicone covers. I bought the rose gold color to match my rose gold phone. I can access all buttons and charger fits just fine (I use an OEM apple charger).
customer_reviews.author: GreedIdGirl07

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have the rose gold marble case to match my rose gold iPhone and I think it looks really nice! The body of the case is hard plastic, while the buttons, bumper, and inside of the case are a softer silicone (I think). The buttons are pretty easy to press, and the cutout for the charging port is large enough that it will probably accommodate any charging cable. This is more of a decorative case than a protective one, but I've dropped my phone a few times onto hard flooring and my screen was fine even without a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty case. I have had it for a few weeks and it has protected my phone pretty well. I wouldn’t say it would protect your screen if you dropped it on gravel, but it has no scratches so far. Pretty sturdy material. The clear has started to turn black, but I think I can wash it off. It could be that the plastic sticks to the charcoal I use or that it is having a reaction of some kind. I don’t think it is a problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Geer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I initially hesitated on getting this, wondering if the marble would look "fake" and boy was I wrong! It's such a beautiful match to my rose gold phone and I've gotten more compliments than ever. It is a little softer and more slippery than I anticipated but I've had it for 7 months now and I've not dropped it (intentionally, at least) and even when I do, you can barely see any damage. The case is just as clean as I was when I first received it months ago. I wish I had another phone so I can buy another one of these cases!
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case, the soft flexible cases are my favorite and protect my phone the best. I’ve had several iPhones and always use these type of cases and never crack my screen. Not to mention my kids always seem to get my phone and throw it. The design is super cute and on trend. Also the price was better than most similar cases.
customer_reviews.author: Bashoe82

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for myself thinking that it might be more durable than a random very thin case I had from Target because I saw it was advertised to have bumpers, however, I am a very clumsy person and have never failed to drop anything from my hands 100's of times. With the case from Target, I had gotten no cracks on my phone screen when I dropped my phone, however, from the times I have dropped my phone with this case, it never ceases to fail to crack my phone screen. I'm highly disappointed with this product, but I do get a lot of compliments on the case's design
customer_reviews.author: Coleen D.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My favorite case that I’ve had for my phone by far. Combined with a durable screen protector, I have dropped my phone multiple times and it has not been damaged at all. The marble rose gold is also super cute. Phone case is small enough on my phone that it still fits comfortably in my back pocket but durable enough to protect the phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! So easy to get on and off, fits perfectly. As others have mentioned, it is quite slippery at first and I was worried about dropping it, but either it’s gotten less slippery or I’ve just gotten used to holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today so limited experience so far but overall I like it for the price. It was easy to get on my phone. You can see the rose gold theoughthe case like typical silicone cases. It fits the off brand charger that was too big for my previous case. The only thing that I don’t like is the power button. It isnt as easy to push as the volume buttons. So screen shotting is more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: CRoss24

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I love how smooth the cover is. It can slide easily into a pocket without “grabbing” due to rubber or silicone edges. It is very lightweight. Can not attest to the durability, as I have just received it today. The covers over the buttons on the side of the iPhone are depressed with ease and have a streamlined interface with the cover. The marbled foil is present but not chincy looking. The marbled gradient looks realistic and not a pixelated picture. Love it thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jalene Crane

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: Phone cases for the iPhone 8 are harder and harder to find. I came across these and thought I would give it a go. I hate phone cases that are slippery and you can see fingerprints. This has a matte finish and does not show fingerprints. It is very slim fitting and you can fit the thin magnet for a car mount. I wish they had more colors in the matte finish. Great buy! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Buhbyegirl

customer_reviews.title: It’s very pretty looking case but it’s not the best for protection
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty looking case but it’s not the best for protection. I expected better. My phone dropped out of my hand and cracked while this case was on. I didn’t have a screen protector phone which was part of the reason but the case didn’t do much for me. It can handle little drops
customer_reviews.author: Zaria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment..
customer_reviews.text: Resembles the look and feel of real marble when attached to my iphone. And the product held up so far, after hitting the floor 3x’s.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Swift

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice case. However I took away a star because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case. However I took away a star because it is not a flexible case as it was described. It showed pictures as if it was made of a very flexible silicone type material. It is actually a hard phone case. But it did fit my daughters iPhone just right and looks exactly like the pictures. A very pretty rose gold marble case. It is not a bulky case fits very close to the phone keeping it slim.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice lip around it that prevents the screen from coming ...
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute. Has a nice lip around it that prevents the screen from coming into direct contact with a surface when it falls. I've had it for about 3 months and it has kept its color. The lip has darkened a little bit but it's still very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: the BEST phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone case i’ve ever owned! I bought this phone case about a year and a half ago now and it’s still in great condition, looking almost brand new! This case also has protected my phone SO MUCH!! I’m so clumsy and drop my phone literally ALL the time and I don’t even have a scratch because of this case. I dropped my phone down a concrete flight of stairs in a parking garage and my phone was perfectly fine. I would highly recommend this case to anyone looking for a cute lightweight case that will still protect your phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this case and the fit! No issues with taking pictures since some cases can leave a weird mark on pics taken cuz the fitting is slightly off. Not this one. I love the look and feel of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but way too slippery - not a normal silicone feel
customer_reviews.text: Giving 2 stars for the design.. I really love the marble on this case but the material is super slippery - not a silicone feel at all. You would have to have a phone grip of some sort just to manage... even when i'm on a call it slips off my shoulder if i'm trying to use it hands free. Its only been a day but definitely will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it... has worked well for about 2 months - no wear and tear on it, at all, and I have dropped it numerous times on the ground... no chipping of the design, or peeling. Looks new still.... I also attached an iRing to it to help me hold my phone(I have small hands), and the adhesive sticks very well, and has not came off... great case.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Jo

customer_reviews.title: Unique and lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I love how unique this case is, and how durable it is. Numerous times I've dropped my phone, and the case has not suffered much, if any, damage. The design is still going strong and not peeling. Very protective case without the bulkiness and is also stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kakanas

customer_reviews.title: So pissed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so beyond pissed! I just bought this crap of a phone case and dropped my phone today and the corner front cracked! I should have kept my other case! Do not buy! Now i have to pay 100$ to ha e my screen repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Really slippery
customer_reviews.text: The case is thick and protective which is nice but it’s soooooo slippery. I’m sad because I really like it but it falls out of my pocket any time I sit down and I drop it a lot because it’s so slick. If this had a little more grip I would love it and give it 5 stars but it kinda defeats the purpose so... I only gave it 3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good protection
customer_reviews.text: The case truly is beautiful. The rose gold sections really are metallic and shiny. Fits my iphone 8 like a glove. I dropped my phone face down on concrete and the screen didn't crack, so there is good protection as well.
customer_reviews.author: cassiesmith00

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! it's durable but not bulky, love the design and get so many compliments on it. Some chargers need a bit of an extra push to get under the case but its super easy
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It protects well and looks pretty, stylish and distinctive. Others have complimented on it. My iphone no longer has a run-of-the-mill look.
customer_reviews.author: Nzinga

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case! I am so happy with this purchase. I read a few comments that said it was a matt finish, well it sort of is but the rose gold is a bit on the shiny side. Since I am not much of a glitzy girl anyway it was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Walker

customer_reviews.title: It’s so beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really pretty and I love it. A lot of people asked where I got it from. I am not sure of durability, since it’s only been a week or so. But it did fell few times, and my phone isnt cracked or scratched. So fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to picture and feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This phone case let’s my rose gold iPhone 7 look brand new! It holds around the phone firmly and has a bumper extension to protect the face from scratches. It is not made from that flexibile silicone type material
customer_reviews.author: P876

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone case for almost two years now and it still looks brand new. Even after handling it for countless of hours every day and dropping it numerous times due to my clumsy self, my iPhone is still scratch free thanks to this case! However, one thing I don't like about the case is how slippery it is. If I didn't have a popsocket, I feel like the phone would slip out of my hands if I don't have a good grip on it. It's cute, long lasting, and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I loved it so much I bought a second one in white, but I like that black better. The white is still a great case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Woods

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPhone case!! It’s the purple color and matches great with the white iPhone. My phone had the same case for almost three years and has been super protected by the raised edge. Looking for a new case was tough until I saw the details about this case including one. Matches the sample image as well. So good for a good price, even makes my phone look slimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used more expensive brands of all shapes. This case brand by far is the most protective, durable, and pretty. This is my 2nd case with this brand. I only switched because I wanted a different color. A must buy phone case!
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay
customer_reviews.text: NOT nearly as bright as the display picture. More mate and dull, especially the pink on the Mabel. Dissapointed. Material is bendable and seems like it will help in a fall... but all in all not worth the price. Seems more like a $5 case then $12.
customer_reviews.author: K-Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Protects my phone perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like that the case is rubber and not super difficult to get on/off. Also, the sides of the case are raised over the front which would make it really hard to crack the screen on the phone. I feel like this will be a case that will keep my phone safe and damage free.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and printed but ok for low price
customer_reviews.text: No texture to the marble, very flat coloring and doesn’t look like real marble. Not the nicest shade of rose gold either. Cheaply made as well. But fit my phone and was cute enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty case. Offers good protection against scratches/knicks
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty case. Offers good protection against scratches/knicks. Rose gold in the design perfectly matches the rose gold iPhone. Great fit on the phone. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ferretti

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year! It works well. I’ve dropped my phone multiple times and it hasn’t broken on me with this case. Look very pretty as well
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and love how the rose gold really shines - did not have any issues with charger as other reviews mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case.. matte finish keeps it from scratching easily
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Bought it for myself and it turned out so pretty! It’s flexible but feels like a hard case when it’s on. So it’s easy to put on and take off but not so flexible that it’s flimsy. Just has some bend to it. The design is perfect and I love the matte finish !
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This case is cute, but is so slippery that I feel like I’m going to drop my phone so easily. It would be better if it wasn’t so slippery.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty case and it’s very durable. Fits as expected and looks great on my rose gold phone.
customer_reviews.author: AZMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This case has worked perfect for me! I love rose gold and white 😍 definitely suggest this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Cuuuute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. My boyfriend gets annoyed when I buy phone cases for looks and not protection but he agreed that this was perfect for both. It’s a hard rubber that fits very tight to the phone. I have dropped it several times and it doesn’t hurt my phone or the case (like a plastic one would).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ann Todd

customer_reviews.title: Durable Case
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year after buying this it’s still on my phone and in great shape! I drop my phone all the time 😆 I would still recommend a screen protector with this case because I have needed to replace mine once with this case, but luckily no broken screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ambers

customer_reviews.title: Little slippery until becoming comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute cover but a little slippery until you become accustomed to the feel. I just worry it could slip out of my hand so I did order a different style
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful phone case it was smooth and gorgeous to look at I used it for years
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love the style for price
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Love the rose gold detail to match my iphone and the matte white finish. The rose gold is shiny and accents the matte perfectly. Id give it a 5 but i wouldnt say this is the BEST case protection wise but its good and does the job. I did read i believe they altered and rose the bumps on the sides a bit but feel it could be a little higher to ensure if your case falls it doesnt crack. But with that being said, in terms of price and style, i cant complain at all. Its a nice smooth case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like the aesthetics of this case, but it doesn't fit my iPhone 8 perfectly. Certain charging cords require some finagling to get them plugged in properly and it seems like it's just a tiny bit too small for my phone, as it doesn't totally wrap around it completely. All that being said, again, it's so pretty and a good case for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for awhile now and absolutely love it. It hasn't faded or scratched with wear and tear. It looks just as good as the day I bought it. I've (sadly) dropped my phone several times but the case has protected my phone each time. When this one fades, I will for sure buy another case from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but cheep.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved the look, but only lasted about 6 moths before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: HNL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this all the time! It had lasted longer than other, more expensive cases I’ve had. Even though i don’t think it’s meant to protect my phone, it seems to do a pretty good job !
customer_reviews.author: AimVino

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this case more than I expected. It’s great quality, and super soft if that matters. My pop socket stays well on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but I don’t think it protects your phone. Loved the design and looks exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stinson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This hasn't scratched or broken when dropped. Durable and super cute. Got a matching rose gold pop-socket. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability!
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive but worth the money! Durable and I like how it snugs my phone in and so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good durability and print
customer_reviews.text: I was a little uneasy about purchasing the granite with rose gold crackle bc some companies are very pixilated on print but i am very pleased with the look and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Staci L

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case a couple of months and it still looks brand new! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my wife as a gift and she hasn't taken it off, very nice and cool looking case
customer_reviews.author: Jason Martinez

customer_reviews.title: The case is beautiful and it certainly would do the job
customer_reviews.text: The case is beautiful and it certainly would do the job. However, I like to put those gorilla glass layers on my screen and although this case has a raised edge, with the extra glass layer, it becomes flush and my brand new screen protector was cracked in less than a day, just by sitting in my pocket with my keys. I will be returning this case as it does not suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: PolarBearMoose

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and charging port is too small. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery!! Cheap plastic, and the charging cable doesn’t really fit in the slot of the case. Wouldn’t buy again, now looking for a new case. It fits the phone well, and it’s pretty, just not functional for a phone case...
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases. It’s a favorite of mine and still looks great after many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A.

customer_reviews.title: IPhone looking sexy and safe...
customer_reviews.text: I've received soo many compliments on it thus far so that's a good thing. Upon purchasing, my main concern was protection because you know in life, shyt happens on a regular and one of those regular things involves dropping or breaking a cellphone (whether purposefully or not). This case is durable. It's solid but not bulky at all. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ttime

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great durable case, it's less slippery than some I have had. I paired it with a rose gold fold out ring and I have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cronkright

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 stars, too early to tell But so far I love what I received Love love the color and texture
customer_reviews.author: loofah creations

customer_reviews.title: Actually Metallic!!!  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other marble cases that aren't actually metallic, the "rose gold" was just a pink color. THIS ONE IS ACTUALLY METALLIC and shiny. Good find on Amazon for sure!
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and seems to protect
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to find a good quality case for such a great price. Has a little lip to protect your screen.
customer_reviews.author: JenGA

customer_reviews.title: Slippery, will fall out of your hand!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has zero grip whatsoever, and will fall out of your hand when you try to use it. It's cheap. I bought because I thought it looked cool, but for this price, I should have known it was low quality....and it was. Don't buy this unless you love dropping your phone.
customer_reviews.author: John Baber

customer_reviews.title: Cute but did not protect my phone. Screen cracked ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but did not protect my phone. Screen cracked right near the lower bottom corner by case. Lip much too shallow around edges.
customer_reviews.author: erl

customer_reviews.title: Form AND function
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. It works. I get compliments on it. The price is great. I've had it for several months and it still looks fantastic. No issues. It shipped quickly and would gladly get the same one again if it became necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hale Monti

customer_reviews.title: Very cute :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. super cute, but you need a screen protector if you don’t want your phone to get scratched
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This case has held up very well so far! It looks exactly like the picture. It has been dropped a few times and shows no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! So pretty and feels nice! Only downside I feel like it should be a little more on my screen on the left side which drives me a little crazy that it’s not perfectly centered, but overall great case! And cheap! So you kinda get what you pay for sometimes lol
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! It looks just like I expected it to from the pics. Very cute and it’s lasted me months without any issues. It is soft it’s probably not the best protection for your phone ever but it’s pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren & Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great value! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. I have had it in my phone for almost 6 months now. Still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Love this case.
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPhone case it’s stylish and cool! I’ve dropped my phone several times and it didn’t crack or break!
customer_reviews.author: April Walker

customer_reviews.title: best quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the quality is amazing, I have gotten so many compliments. It is tough I have dropped my phone multiple times and it protects my phone. I have been using it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: khanima

customer_reviews.title: Love the material
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Material is strong durable, not slippery and easy to grip. Very chic!
customer_reviews.author: Coats

customer_reviews.title: Camera hole did not fit
customer_reviews.text: This not worth it. I ordered it and when it came in the camera hole was too small and blocked half my camera. I couldn't return it because it would cost almost as much as the case to ship it back. Don't waste the money.
customer_reviews.author: Micayla Goulet

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case I've had it since mid March ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case I've had it since mid March and it's July now. It still looks brand new even after all I've put it through!! It's a pretty design and well made. I've dropped it quite a bit, and it has protected my phone really well. I definitely recommend this phone case!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This case is first off very cute, it’s even cuter in person and has a cool shine to it. The rose gold is soo pretty. I drop my phone A LOT and this case has held up really well. Normally my cases get scratched up really quickly and get indents in them. This case appears to be the same as the day I got it. It’s definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it !!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the case for three reasons :Design,Durability in keeping my phone safe and sound & overall a good bang for your buck.I’ve had it now for over 6 months !
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I’ve even dropped my phone a few times and it protected my phone and held up well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Granacher

customer_reviews.title: love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color of my case. I like that it's just a simple case but still pretty
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it beacause is thick and has a great cover. It’s pretty as well
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Looks upscale !
customer_reviews.text: Better then the picture. I got it in rose gold & now want it for my air buds. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa in PA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the quality but it had a nice weight to it and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so cute and has protected my phone thru many drops!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and protects well
customer_reviews.text: Nice, flexible case, very stylish and protects well. I’ve already dropped my phone 4x and it was protected while in this case with no subsequent damage. I recommend purchasing a screen guard which I just added today. The case is a bit slippery in hand so I also recommend purchasing an adhesive ring to stick on the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very thin case.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but I wish it had more fall protection. Very thin case. If I didn’t have a tempered glass screen protector on my phone, my phone screen would definitely brake.
customer_reviews.author: Gulnara M

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Was in the need for a new phone case and I saw one of my clients with this one. Decided to try it for myself and let me tell you, what a great case! I have the iPhone 8. This case is not only stylish but sturdy and well made. No question, if you like the style, you should get this case!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki TB

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this phone case for about 2-3 months and it’s so far the one that has lasted the longest, very worth the price, I am a very clumsy person and tend to drop my phone a lot and the case looks just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

product_meta.title: BAISRKE Shiny Rose Gold Marble Design Clear Bumper Matte TPU Soft Rubber Silicone Cover Phone Case Compatible with iPhone 7 iPhone 8 [4.7 inch] - White
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone 7 [2016 Release] & Apple iPhone 8 [2017 Release] 4.7 inch, NOT COMPATIBLE iPhone Plus (5.5 inch)
Special pattern on the case makes your phone different and eyes-catching
Protect your phone from scratches, bumps and other daily damage
Access to all the controls and features; Perfect cutouts for speakers, camera and other ports
Material: The case is made from Flexible Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and IMD (In-Mould-Decoration) Technology. Make the Print Vivid and Never Fade
